content: Seems that docs#CyclotomicField.algebraBase and docs#CyclotomicField.algebra' are exactly the same, only the variable order has changed. There are no comments explaining this in source file. Are there some special reasons to do that?
Most likely an historical accident. PR welcome! (You can also fix the name).
Which name is preferred? I have no idea.

Seems that they are already in mathlib3: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib3/blob/65a1391a0106c9204fe45bc73a039f056558cb83/src/number_theory/cyclotomic/basic.lean#L559-L574

And they are not same in mathlib3: cyclotomic_field.algebra_base and cyclotomic_field.algebra'; one of them requires IsFractionRing (which is superfluous, of course).
Jz Pan has marked this topic as resolved.
